ab-top_tweets

Source: vignettes/ab-top_tweets.Rmd
ab-top_tweets.Rmd
library(tweetrbot)
library(readr)

Example dataset

file <- system.file("complete_tweets_rspatial.rds", package = "tweetrbot")

all_tweets <- read_rds(file)

Top retweets

In this vignette, I do not really post the tweet. I only retrieve its content.

output <- top_tweets(all_tweets = all_tweets, post_tweet = FALSE, top_number = 5)

output$number_contributors

output$top_retweet

output$number_tweets

output$text_tweet

Summary of April #rspatial: 195 tweets, 84 different contributors.

Most retweeted: https://twitter.com/jakub_nowosad/status/1251872204012302337 by @jakub_nowosad.
